arts.ttl: Cifuentes ‘not happy’ as QPR’s poor run continues
arts.sum: Marti Cifuentes admitted QPR’s lack of options up front told in the 1-0 defeat at West Brom. With Zan Celar and Rayan Kolli already unavailable, Michael Frey missed the game at The Hawthorns with a minor injury. Paul Smyth therefore started up front – and Rangers had plenty of possession. But they failed to muster […] The post Cifuentes ‘not happy’ as QPR’s poor run continues appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: Adam Armstrong’s penalty proves enough as 10-man West Brom edge past QPR
arts.sum: Armstrong’s 40th-minute penalty earned Albion victory despite Darnell Furlong’s red card for a suspected elbow on Koki Saito just before half-time.

arts.ttl: Strikerless QPR lose to 10-man West Brom
arts.sum: QPR were beaten at The Hawthorns, where they failed to muster an effort on target until the final moments despite playing the second half against 10 men after Darnell Furlong was sent off against his former club. Adam Armstrong’s first-half penalty was enough to see off Rangers, who played without a recognised striker after Michael […] The post Strikerless QPR lose to 10-man West Brom appeared first on West London Sport.
